item.title: European AI Unicorn Pivots To Launch Fleet Of Killer Drones
item.description: Helsing built a $4.5 billion business on a pledge to transform Europe’s militaries with software, not hardware.

item.title: China’s Surveillance State Is Losing Its Grip
item.description: China is losing control of it's surveillance state as insiders profit.

item.title: Almost Every Hospital Bed In England Is Full, And Winter Has Just Begun
item.description: Rising cases of flu, norovirus, COVID-19 and RSV are sending thousands to hospital every week — and raising fears of a "quad-demic."

item.title: Cherry Picks Two New Gaming Keyboards For Christmas Launch
item.description: The market for high-spec gaming keyboards shows no sign of slowing and Cherry has treated gamers to two new pro-level mechanical keyboards for the edg...

item.title: An Update On ‘The Madness’ Season 2 On Netflix
item.description: Will there be a season 2 of The Madness? There's a new update about that.
